room_title: Escape room "Wizards and Wands" by Mind Games in Roseau
review: We had a group of people from ages 8 into adulthood and did the Wands and Wizards room. We did not find the sorting hat in time but we had a blast! The people who ran this place were very friendly and professional. I can't wait until I can come back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Wizards and Wands" by Mind Games in Roseau
review: Had so much fun gong through the Wands and Wizards room! Made it out with a few minutes to spare. Looking forward to doing another room soon.
